name: Abyssal Plains
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 - Lost&Found

Explore the bottom of the oceans for hidden treasures and cute animals!
Grab sunken artifacts to earn money and spend it to upgrade your submarine.

Use your light beam to scan creatures and pull treasures.
Don't forget your sonar, it's helpful to locate nearby artifacts and refill stations.

Controls Mouse Left Click
MoveMouse Right Click
SonarEscapeQuit
